description: Compensation logic requires the core function to exist first.
Testing can only begin once the function is feature-complete.
impact_if_delayed: Delays validation of the registration feature.

description: Frontend integration requires the backend function to be complete and tested.
mitigation_plan: Develop against a mocked backend function based on the API contract from TASK-001.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the E2E completion of the registration flow.

description: Check-out logic depends on the check-in process being implemented first.
impact_if_delayed: Delays completion of the core attendance cycle.

description: The automated test suite for security rules can only be written after the rules themselves are designed.
mitigation_plan: Begin test case design in parallel with rule design.
impact_if_delayed: Leaves the platform vulnerable until security is validated.
